input_email_body:
Subject: Support Request for Data Loss in HR Department

I am experiencing issues with data loss in the HR section You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. Critical project files have suddenly disappeared, possibly due to synchronization or integration issues. I have already restarted the system, sought backups, and restored the systems, but the problem persists. I would be very grateful for your assistance in resolving this issue as soon as possible. My name is Jane Smith.
